sentences.sContent: ‘Do you reckon Margot will be there?’ ‘ Definitely not .’
sentences.sCn: “你估计玛戈会在那里吗？” “肯定不会。”

sentences.sContent: The hotel fitness centre is definitely worth a visit.
sentences.sCn: 这家酒店的健身中心绝对值得一去。

sentences.sContent: ...I can definitely remember what I learned on certain days at school...
...I definitely feel things more strongly than the average person...
...But they were definitely surprised and distressed to be referred to as‘he’ in your speech...
...But they were definitely surprised and distressed to be referred to as‘he’ in your speech...

...Campus plays a crucial role in educating the young generation and the consciousness of “green campus” will definitely produce a profound effect on students’ various environmental protection activities after their graduation...

synos.tran: 清楚地，当然；明确地，肯定地

words.tran: 有定义的，确定的；清晰的，轮廓分明的
